recommended_actions.title: Escalate d031 to human review
recommended_actions.notes: d031 has been unresolved for 26 sessions despite multiple structural fixes (R#115, R#121). E sessions consistently fail to complete Pinchwork tasks. Either: (1) Pinchwork has no available tasks, (2) task workflow is too complex for E sessions to follow, or (3) some other blocker. Human input needed.
